Module atlantafx.base
Package atlantafx.base.controls

Class TileBase

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
atlantafx.base.controls.TileBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Message, Tile
public abstract class TileBase extends javafx.scene.control.Control
A common class for implementing tile-based controls, specifically the Message and the Tile.

  • Property Details

    • graphic

      public javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<javafx.scene.Node> graphicProperty
      Represents the tile’s graphic node. It is commonly used to add images or icons that are associated with the tile.
      See Also:
      • getGraphic()
      • setGraphic(Node)

    • title

      public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty titleProperty
      Represents the tile’s title (or header).
      See Also:
      • getTitle()
      • setTitle(String)

    • description

      public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty descriptionProperty
      Represents the tile’s description (or optional text).

      This property supports BBCode formatted text. Refer to the BBCodeParser for more information.

      See Also:
      • getDescription()
      • setDescription(String)
